mapper.insert: insert into tblSpringBoard (seq, id, subject, content, regdate, orgfilename, filename) values (seqSpringBoard.nextVal, #{id}, #{subject}, #{content}, default, #{orgfilename}, #{filename})
mapper.select: select seq, id, (select name from tblUser where id = tblspringBoard.id) as name, subject, regdate, filename from tblspringboard order by seq desc
